text:
Component is the application developer documentation.
This error has been in tomcat for some time.

Both of the files mentioned below have a <mkdir todir=......
and the line 322 fails because docs.dir is pointing to the ${basedir}

--fix--
321s/todir/dir/
118s/basedir/dist\.dir/

http://localhost:8080/tomcat-docs/appdev/build.xml.txt
http://localhost:8080/tomcat-docs/appdev/sample/build.xml
